title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 160.5 - Computation of state aid
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 160.5 - Computation of state aid

State Regulations
(a) For
the purposes of computation of the apportionment, the total hours of
instruction for a designated local education agency shall be the sum of the
hours provided directly by such agency and the hours of instruction provided in
approved programs within its area of service by provider agencies and other
organizations. (b) The total number
of hours of related and supplemental instruction for apprentices in approved
apprenticeship training programs in the State shall be computed by adding the
hours of instruction reported by all designated local education agencies in the

State pursuant to section
160.7
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
160.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
